** WIP **

The {avocado} package provides a summary of weekly Hass avocado sales for the United States. The underlying data are from [The Hass Avocado Board](https://hassavocadoboard.com).

## Installation

Install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("nikdata/avocado")
```
